body.message: The search filters have an invalid format.

errors.message: Does not have a value in the enumeration ["SINCE LAST N DAYS"]
String value found, but an integer is required
Invalid date-time "abc123", expected format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+hh:mm

String value found, but an array is required
